Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4418 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 7.10.0-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4418 affecting package libvirt for versions less than 7.10.0-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package libvirt is earlier than 7.10.0-10, affected by CVE-2024-4418
